Trump threatens retaliation if Mamdani is elected New York mayor
subhead: The US president endorsed former Democratic governor Andrew Cuomo and threatened to cut federal funding to the city if the young Democratic candidate, whom he called a 'communist,' is elected.

title: For France's prime minister, a budget 'endurance race'

Shein says will cooperate with France in sex doll probe
subhead: The Paris prosecutors' office launched investigations after France's anti-fraud unit reported that Shein was selling childlike sex dolls. On Monday, Shein announced it was imposing a 'total ban on sex-doll-type products' and had deleted all listings and images linked to them.

title: In the Danube Delta, war weakens already threatened ecosystems
subhead: Biologists and local residents observe direct and indirect effects of the war on the wildlife and flora of the Danube Delta Biosphere Reserve.

title: Israel's war in Gaza is still rocking the music industry
subhead: Boycotts, benefit concerts, open letters: Two years after the war started, more and more musicians have openly supported Palestinians. While many British and Irish artists have spoken out, such activism has struggled to gain traction in France.

title: Rosalía returns with mystical album: 'God has given me so much, the least I could do is make an album for him'
subhead: Three albums and a string of hit singles have propelled her to the ranks of global pop divas. After a three-year hiatus, the 33-year-old Catalan artist returns with 'Lux,' a musical fresco in praise of the divine and major female saints.

The Orient Express pulls up in Paris: An opulent journey into the 1920s
subhead: The legendary luxury train is making a stop at Paris's Musée des Arts Décoratifs until spring. As part of the major exhibition dedicated to the centenary of Art Deco, three life-size mock-ups of the new Orient Express, set to return to service soon, are on display.

title: JD Vance positions himself as heir of MAGA movement
subhead: The US vice president has made his mark in what is often a thankless role, railing against immigration, placing faith at the heart of his message and playing his part in diplomacy. He is seeking to make his candidacy for 2028 unavoidable – without upsetting Donald Trump.

title: Svalbard, the fastest-warming place on Earth
subhead: 'Our planet at +1.5°C' (1/6). The Norwegian archipelago has warmed by 4°C over the past 30 years. Landslides and thawing permafrost threaten the population, whose way of life is highly greenhouse gas-intensive.
